pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā amhe upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.7: ‘bahū, āvuso, kosakārake pacatha, amhākampi dassatha, mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kātun’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.8: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṃ, ye mayaṃ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādemā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.9: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.10: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.11: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.12: ‘bahū, āvuso, kosakārake pacatha, amhākampi dassatha, mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kātun’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.13: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.14: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadetha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.19: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vakkhatha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.20: ‘bahū, āvuso, kosakārake pacatha, amhākampi dassatha, mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kātun’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.23: “Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.8: ekenapi kosiyaṃsunā missitvā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.10: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.13: idaṃ me, bhante, kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.1: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.2: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.3: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.4: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.5: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.6: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.8: vitānaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā sāṇipākāraṃ vā bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karoti,
